      Determine whether it is legal to move the current Selection to a destination pile indicated by a Location.
      void KlondikeController.drawCardOrRecycleWaste(KlondikeModel model)
      If the main deck is not empty, then remove the top card from the main deck and add it to the waste pile.

      Initialize the model object.
      boolean KlondikeController.isWin(KlondikeModel model)
      Determine if the player has won the game.
      static java.lang.String StringifyGameState.modelToString(KlondikeModel model)
      Convert the game state stored in the given KlondikeModel object to a string.
      void KlondikeController.moveCards(KlondikeModel model, Selection selection, Location dest)
      Move the cards in a Selection onto a pile as indicated by the destination Location.
      Selection KlondikeController.select(KlondikeModel model, Location location)
      Attempt to create a Selection that represents one or more Cards to be moved from a pile indicated by a Location.
      static void StringifyGameState.stringToModel(KlondikeModel model, java.lang.String s)
      Decode a string (which was returned by some previous call to StringifyGameState.modelToString(KlondikeModel)) and store the game state it encodes to the given KlondikeModel object.
      void KlondikeController.unselect(KlondikeModel model, Selection selection)
      "Undo" a selection by moving cards from a Selection object back to the pile they were taken from, as indicated by the selection's origin Location.
